Parameters: The size of the button to display. Valid values are @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#SIZE_STANDARD_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#SIZE_WIDE_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#SIZE_ICON_ONLY_E@.
setSize(int).Description: Set the size of the button to use. The color scheme will remain unchanged.

Parameters: The color scheme to use for the button. Valid values are @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#COLOR_DARK_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#COLOR_LIGHT_E@.
setColorScheme(int).Description: Set the color scheme of the button to use. The size will remain unchanged.

Parameters: The size of the button to display. Valid values are @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#SIZE_STANDARD_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#SIZE_WIDE_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#SIZE_ICON_ONLY_E@.

setStyle(int, int).Description: Set the desired style of button to use. This will update the button to use the specified size and color scheme.
setStyle(int, int).FullName: public void setStyle (int buttonSize, int colorScheme)

ClassDesc: The Google sign-in button to authenticate the user. Note that this class only handles the visual aspects of the button. In order to trigger an action, register a listener using @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#setOnClickListener_E@. Note that you must explicitly call @B_com#google#android#gms#common#SignInButton#setOnClickListener_E@. Do not register a listener via XML, or you won't receive your callbacks.
